judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
 ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICGTION 
Contempt Petition No. 77 of 2004 
in
Writ Petition No. 1074 of 1987
 Balasaheb P. Pawar
... Petitioner 
vs.
The Airport Director,
International Airport Authority of India & ors. .. Respondents
Ms. Madhulata Rajale i/b
Mahesh Thorat for petitioner 
Mr. S.K. Talsania with Yastal Mehta 
i/b. Kanga & Girdharilal for respondent 
CORAM: A. S. AGUIAR J. 
Date: December, 17, 2004
P.C. 

 Learned advocate for the respondent files affidavit in
reply to show cause notice dated 3rd November 2004 from which it
appears that the respondents have substantially complied with the
order dated 3rd September 2003 and the consequential reliefs
prayed for are under consideration. However, for quantifying the
consequential reliefs he requires certain information to be supplied
by the petitioner. The petitioner is directed to supply the
necessary information to the respondents within a week. 
S. O. beyond x-mas vacation. 
(A. S. AGUIAR J.)
